review: Still learning it, sometimes it stops the audio and others the picture. Just have to work hard for synchronization
author: Wayne wadley

review: Really depends on your needs. For some applications, I prefer the Roku due to the onscreen menu. I use the Chromecast mainly for music and it is a great solution for the price. I can use my iPhone/iPad to control music (in my case Google's streaming service).
author: Mark R. Evans

review: Chromecast has always given me yeoman service.
author: Reynold V.

review: Easy to install, great function , also good deal.
author: Regina Leon

review: Good product but I personally prefer Roku's Streaming Stick product at the same price level.
author: James Bullerman
